name: Spicy Refrigerator Dill Pickles
author: FAIRYFAHRENHOLZ
summary: This is a wonderful, spicy dill pickle with a nice hint of sweetness.  Plan to at least double the amount of crushed red pepper if you like it REALLY spicy...YUM!
ingredients: 1 ½ cups chopped fresh dill weed
½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste
directions: In a large bowl, combine the cucumbers, water, vinegar, chopped dill, sugar, garlic, salt, pickling spice, dill seed, and red pepper flakes
Stir, and let stand at room temperature for 2 hours, until the sugar and salt dissolve
Remove the cucumbers to three 1 1/2 pint wide mouth jars, placing 4 cucumbers into each jar
Ladle in the liquid from the bowl to cover
Place a sprig of fresh dill into each jar, and seal with lids
